Class BoxListItemAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
      • com.box.boxandroidlibv2.adapters.BoxListItemAdapter
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FolderNavigationActivity.FolderNavigationBoxListItemAdapter

    public class BoxListItemAdapter
extends
    An adapter that displays files and folders for a user to select.

    dcung
